biotools.summary: Hidden Markov Models for ChIP-on-Chip Analysis. It provides methods and classes to build HMMs that are suitable for the analysis of ChIP-on-chip data. The provided parameter estimation methods include the Baum-Welch algorithm and Viterbi training as well as a combination of both.

bioschemas.name: TileHMM
bioschemas.summary: Hidden Markov Models for ChIP-on-Chip Analysis. It provides methods and classes to build HMMs that are suitable for the analysis of ChIP-on-chip data. The provided parameter estimation methods include the Baum-Welch algorithm and Viterbi training as well as a combination of both.
